about_the_game:
Collapsed Galaxy 2 is a tribute from the team and community to a game loved 21 years ago.

  • In this interstellar contest, where alliances and betrayals are rife, only the most astute commanders will emerge victorious in the solar system's struggle for dominance.

  • Join or create a legion, aim to lead, and your decisions will crucially affect the tense political and military situation.

  • As a legion commander, you have the chance to ascend to the height of imperial power by winning a factional election, becoming the Imperial Regent.

  • The Regent can assign legion leaders to key posts, such as Minister of Intelligence, Minister of Foreign Affairs, Minister of Defense, and Commander of the Imperial Guard.

  • Experience up to 50-player real-time strategic battles, with dynamic territorial control by factions, where managing intelligence and supply lines is key.

  • Customize and equip over 2500 combat components freely according to your tech path and level, to adapt to the evolving frontline battlefields.

Collapsed Galaxy 1 Originated from Chinese Community Co-Creation Ten Years Ago

  • The game thrives on contributions, support, and encouragement from the Chinese player community. Visit our website to view this valuable list.

name: Collapsed Galaxy 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL.i5 6500 / AMD FX6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: INTEL.i7 10700K / AMD 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT 12GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Human factions face increasingly severe conflicts, with the 'Planetary Defense Council' secretly seeking political power in space and colonies. Discover a breakthrough to maintain dominance between starport and crisis-ridden colonial planets. A 4C-RTS Game: Collaborate, Control, Conspire, Conquer.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
